Uses of Interface
edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.AtomicMatrix

  • Packages that use AtomicMatrix 
    Package Description
    edu.ucla.sspace.matrix  

    • Uses of AtomicMatrix in edu.ucla.sspace.matrix

      Classes in edu.ucla.sspace.matrix that implement AtomicMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AtomicGrowingMatrix
      A concurrent, thread-safe, growable Matrix class.
      class  AtomicGrowingSparseHashMatrix
      A concurrent, thread-safe, growable SparseMatrix class that is optimized for operations only access one value of the matrix at a time.
      class  AtomicGrowingSparseMatrix
      A concurrent, thread-safe, growable SparseMatrix class.
      class  SynchronizedMatrix
      A Matrix decorator class that provides thread safe access to a backing Matrix instance.
      class  SynchronizedSparseMatrix
      A SparseMatrix decorator class that provides thread safe access to a backing SparseMatrix instance.
      Methods in edu.ucla.sspace.matrix that return AtomicMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AtomicMatrix Matrices.synchronizedMatrix(Matrix m)
      Returns a synchronized (thread-safe) matrix backed by the provided Matrix.
      static AtomicMatrix Matrices.synchronizedSparseMatrix(SparseMatrix m)
      Returns a synchronized (thread-safe) matrix backed by the provided SparseMatrix.
